Music at Glastonbury 2014

Written by Leon Paternoster · Published Jun 26, 2014

Download or stream these Glastonbury 2014 artists for free from our Freegal service. All you need is your library card and PIN:

  • Futurology by Manic Street Preachers
  • Blue Smoke—The Best of by Dolly Parton
  • 48:13 by Kasabian
  • Supermodel by Foster the People
  • Pass in Time—The Definitive Collection by Beth Orton
  • Austin City Limits Music Festical album, featuring The Black Keys, Kaiser Chiefs and Kasabian, among others

Leon Paternoster

I'm head of digital and marketing. I developed our self-service system, Verso, which you can find out more about on Dootrix, the self-service software developer's website.
